headline: Should Newmont’s 2025 Earnings Strength and Cerro Negro Spend Require Action From Newmont (NEM) Investors?
summary: Newmont Corporation has reported past fourth-quarter 2025 sales of US$6.82 billion and net income of US$1.30 billion, declared a US$0.26 cash dividend for that quarter, and confirmed 2026 attributable gold production guidance of about 5.3 million ounces. Alongside stronger full-year 2025 earnings and share buybacks totaling US$548.18 million, Newmont committed roughly US$800 million to extend the life of its Cerro Negro mine, signaling continued investment in core assets. Next, we’ll assess...

headline: Bernstein upgrades Newmont on higher gold price forecasts
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein upgraded Newmont to Outperform from Market-Perform and raised its price target to $157 from $121, citing a sharply higher long-term gold price outlook.

content.title: Bernstein upgrades Newmont on higher gold price forecasts
content.summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein upgraded Newmont to Outperform from Market-Perform and raised its price target to $157 from $121, citing a sharply higher long-term gold price outlook.

headline: CIBC Cuts Barrick Mining's Price Target to US$67.00 from US$71.00

headline: Metallic Minerals to Exhibit at PDAC 2026 in Toronto, March 1-4 (Booth 2724)
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - February 27, 2026) - Metallic Minerals Corp. (TSXV: MMG) (OTCQB: MMNGF) (FSE: 9MM1) ("Metallic" or the "Company") is pleased to be attending the 2026 Prospectors & Developers Association of Canada ("PDAC") Convention in Toronto from March 1-4, 2026. The Company will be exhibiting at Booth #2724 at the Metro Toronto Convention Centre under The Metallic Group, shared with Stillwater Critical Minerals Corp. (TSXV: PGE). Management will be available to.
